website_summaries.verdict: An interesting twist on red nail polish that makes a nice addition to any makeup enthusiast's nail color collection.
pros: This highly pigmented shade from the red family offers a rich, dramatic look
Only requires one coat to achieve beautiful color
cons: Those who prefer a true red may not be fond of the mauve-like hue
Chips are noticeable, due to the darker shade

customer_reviews.title: Imposter
customer_reviews.text: This isnt a real Butter London nail polish! I kept it because the color is great but the brush isn’t real Butter London and neither is the cap. In the photo you can see how the brushes and caps are different. On the left, the dark pink, is what I bought off Amazon. On the right is what I bought from Butter.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Butter is Better
customer_reviews.text: I debated a long time before buying this polish. I love it! I can't tell you how different this polish is. First, the bottle is different. Classy, pretty, and rectangular. The color is gorgeous. One coat of color coats with no streaking. I wear this with a top coat and it lasts weeks with no chipping. This nail lacquer makes my nails and hands look pretty; a simple thing, maybe, but I don't bite my nails or cuticles anymore--it would mess up my nails. I also bought Tea With the Queen, a beautiful neutral shade. I have paid more for Deborah Lippmann polish and there is no comparison. Butter is better!
customer_reviews.author: Tin Ear

customer_reviews.title: Sooo pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rosy mauve. Easy to apply. Perfect fall color. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Marshmallow

customer_reviews.title: Non-toxic and long lasting nail polish
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and long lasting finish— exactly what I was hoping for! I was an instant fan of Butter polish the very first time I tried it, and I don’t think I’ll ever go back to the toxic alternatives that don’t last nearly as long.
customer_reviews.author: RdR

customer_reviews.title: Dahling
customer_reviews.text: Yes dahling nice color and thick polish. The applicator brush is a little thin so reason for taking star away
customer_reviews.author: tideschild

customer_reviews.title: Try to check colors in the store first
customer_reviews.text: I really should have gone to the store rather than trusting how colors would translate from online to in person. Since I'm a fan of butter London, it seemed like a safe gamble. Wow was I wrong. The color Dahling (such a fun name, like all their colors) looks *nothing* like the photo. I thought it was going to be a delicious medium sherberty pink and it's actually rather dowdy, a matronly mauvey pink. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy!!! This is the best polish I've ever worn. Wish I could get other colors off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of the value for money, but it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: S | S | S

customer_reviews.title: I love nail polish Dahling
customer_reviews.text: I love this polish! The color is gorgeous and it spread very easily which is super helpful. I wash my hands a lot at work so unfortunately this polish didn’t hold up for more than a couple of days. But I still recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well - lasts as long as "traditional brands". Like the color
customer_reviews.author: AKB

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: This polish is a little pricey, but it really lasts longer than most nail polishes and doesn’t chip easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Great shade!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! It has a very subtle sheen from teeny tiny gold glitters that would normally be invisible. I've been looking for a vintage-looking pink color and this is perfect on my yellow-toned hands.
customer_reviews.author: Z.

customer_reviews.title: not so outstanding but a all right product
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit darker and vivid pink than the picture. I thought it would not smell badly like other regular nail polish since it's non toxic but actually it smells exactly the same. Drys pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Xuan X

customer_reviews.title: OMG Luv these colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the Butter London nail colors. They are rich and creamy unlike alot of "natural" polishes. This is the only kind I wear now. This color in particular is lovely. A warm rose that had a little spunk!
customer_reviews.author: A. Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Dry Polish
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this color because it's my favorite one, but when it was shipped to me, the nail polish had already dried inside the bottle and I wasn't able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Monina G.

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE RIPOFF -- READ BEFORE BUYING!
customer_reviews.text: I've never felt so ripped off in my life. You would think that by paying $15 for a luxury brand of nail polish, you wouldn't get an expired, old bottle of off-color polish that isn't worth a single cent. I ordered this polish in Trout Pout and have used $1 polishes with better quality than this. Please do not order anything from this brand online or on Amazon, and at least try a bottle out and buy at a store instead of taking a risk by buying online. I'll never order anything from this brand again. Hope others wisen up and do the same.
customer_reviews.author: WunderWoman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Nail Lacquer
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and lasted a long time. Love this brand. Will definitely buy more of this brand. Plus a very pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Dahling- love it!
customer_reviews.text: Butter London polishes are one of my favorite brands of all time, and they're captured my heart once again with 'Dahling', my 14th Butter polish. This creamy pink applies like- wait for it- butter! and an experienced painter should have no problem applying an opaque coat in one go. With a great top coat and wrapped tips, this polish lasts up to a week with no chips and only a bit of tip wear, just like the rest of the polishes offered by Butter!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand of polish because of the healthier ingredients. I also bought the base and top coats by Butter London ($29.99 for both) and followed exact instructions. I used a base coat, 2 coats of polish and top coat. Less than 24 hours later, it's chipped dramatically all over. Unfortunately, I can't return these products because of Amazon's return policy of hazardous materials i.e. nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: AngieG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the color so much!!! And it is the easiest nail polish I have used to apply
customer_reviews.author: Wuyang

customer_reviews.title: very shiny color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend. It's sparkling. not very elegant. but young and snappy. very suitable for club and dancing. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Color not true
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous nail lacquer, but I now know that I cannot purchase it online. Since the pictures online are not shown in full spectrum color, the shade of the actual polish does not match what I see online. The color was not at all what I expected, so I gave it away unopened.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleShirley

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long and the color is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased "seaside". The nail polish goes on opaque in 2 coast. I use the base and a top. I get a lot of compliments all the time!!! The nail polish lasts a long time and I do a lot with my hands as a stay at home mom. I have 2 small kids and wash my hands constantly. This picture was taken on day 5 on me wearing it. As you can see it looks like I just painted them!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caramel

customer_reviews.title: Forever to dry. Thin. And stripped my nails.
customer_reviews.text: I thought because this was a cleaner nail polish that it wouldn’t damage my nails like crazy. But lord. My nails we sapped of all life. I had to cut them to the quick and start over. I’ve tried a few colors (all ordered at the same time) and all of them just leave my nails so dry and brittle. It’s like I got a really aggressive gel manicure. It also just sort of wears away. No matter how thick you paint it with in a few days you can see your nail underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try Butter but unfortunately it was a waste of money! After 24 hours every nail had significant chips. The polish can be peeled right off with little effort! If I had done significant housework or was rough on my nails I could understand this but all I did was take a shower and work on my computer. I have never had this issue with other brands such as OPI or Essie and they are significantly less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Used a butter London base coat and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Used a butter London base coat and top coat for a nice shine. The polish has good staying power when applied this way.
customer_reviews.author: Anna1755

customer_reviews.title: Very tame pink
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a little more pop with this color. It's a pretty pink, but it doesn't wow me. It looks kind of corporate and I'm not corporate! I'm going to give it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: elancee

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color but does not stay on nails any better than the cheaper brands.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Love the Butter range!
customer_reviews.text: This Butter brand polish has added to my collection from this brand. The colours (and monikers) are great. The less toxic ingredients are an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: ViWo

product_meta.title: butter LONDON Nail Lacquer, Dahling
product_meta.description: butter LONDON nail lacquers each feature a nourishing, vitamin-infused, highly-pigmented formula that promotes nail strength and health while offering you countless colors and finishes to choose from. And because butter LONDON wants to give you color without compromise, it does not add formaldehyde, toluene or DBP to any of its nail formulas.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
